attributes.action: The NHS is fully funded to ensure decent wages and resources for all staff.
attributes.additional_details: It is apparent that our NHS is the most important public resource deployed by our government in recent weeks. The current public health situation has highlighted the need to preserve the excellent NHS system that has been under resourced and neglected for far too long. Many departments have been outsourced and run on an ever decreasing budget. It is time to recognise the people need a NHS, want a NHS and expect their government to allocate the appropriate funds to their NHS.
attributes.background: Ensure that the NHS is safe and receives the necessary funding and resources that will deliver a world class, free health service.
